boxi_documents.NAME: Talk Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Duration in seconds from the time the caller connects to a Call Center resource (agent, auxiliary device, trunk, admin user, voice port) or information announcement caller may hear prior to connecting to the Call Center resource. This does not include hold time
boxi_documents.NAME: Select Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total time in seconds agent is reserved, waiting for network call to be connected
boxi_documents.NAME: Ring Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: For an incoming call this is the duration in seconds of ringing before the Call Center answers with an announcement or an agent. This includes, for example, time to evaluate DNIS/DDI digits and time to connect to a CCT. For an outgoing call this is the duration in seconds from time outside or inside line key is pressed until ENTER or RELEASE key is pressed.
boxi_documents.NAME: Queue Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: For an incoming call this is the duration in seconds from SELECT step to terminating CCT step, such as CONNECT. This includes any ringing caller hears after connection to a CCT
boxi_documents.NAME: Network Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total time in seconds before Network InterQueue request CCT step on originating Call Center
boxi_documents.NAME: Hold Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Duration in seconds a caller spends on hold after an agent manually places the caller on hold
boxi_documents.NAME: Dial Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: For future use
boxi_documents.NAME: Delay Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Duration in seconds a caller spends listening to noninformation announcements
boxi_documents.NAME: Call Type Time In Sec
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Duration in seconds agent listens to call-type announcement

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total count of calls in table call-details.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The payment receipt number is a unique receipt number for a payment supplied by the payment gateway.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Information about the reject type of a payment (like unpaid direct debit, credit card declined,...).

boxi_documents.NAME: Unbilled Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The amount yet not accounted in the current bill cycle (sum of unbilled usage events and one off charges).
boxi_documents.NAME: Total Invoice Payment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The sum of all payments effected since last billrun (can be more than one payment).
boxi_documents.NAME: Adjustment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- Adjustments (including VAT).
boxi_documents.NAME: Balance Forward

boxi_documents.NAME: Invoice Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The amount in Euro for an invoice (including VAT).

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Shows a date if data is consistent, else "Data not consistent".
boxi_documents.NAME: Invoice Payment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Don't use this measure with other measure. -- The amount of a payment which is applied to a specific invoice.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The total Amount of the payment - regardless to which invoice(s) this payment was applied to.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Comment
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The comment of the payment.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment ID
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The payment receipt number is a unique receipt number for a payment supplied by the payment gateway.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Reject Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Information about the reject type of a payment (like unpaid direct debit, credit card declined,...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Allocation Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Information about the allocation of a payment to invoices and accounts (depends on the information provided by the External Calling System to Billing).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Information about the type of payment (like bank, direct debit, refund, ...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Suspense Reason Description
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Description why a payment was suspended.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Suspense Reason
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Information why a payment was suspended (like an invalid account number).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Status
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The information about the status of a payment (like applied, rejected, ...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Location
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the payment source.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment To Adjustment Amount
Payment To Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total Amount of the payment after a change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment To Rejected Gl Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned rejected GL code changes, you can see to which rejected GL code the payment was assigned to after the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment To Adjustment GL Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned Adjustment GL code changes, you can see to which Adjustment GL code the payment was assigned to after the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment To Gl Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned GL code changes, you can see to which GL code the payment was assigned to after the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment To Account ID
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned account changes, you can see to which account the payment was assigned to after the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Adjustment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total Amount of the payment before a change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Total Amount of the payment before a change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Rejected Gl Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned rejected GL code changes, you can see to which rejected GL code the payment was assigned to before the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Adjustment GL Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned Adjustment GL code changes, you can see to which Adjustment GL code the payment was assigned to before the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Gl Code
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned GL code changes, you can see to which GL code the payment was assigned to before the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment From Account ID
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: If payment information regarding the assigned account changes, you can see to which account the payment was assigned to before the change.
boxi_documents.NAME: Topup Channel Name
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The name of the topup channel (like Web-UI, Contact Center UI, ...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Date Rejected
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date when the payment was rejected.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Date Applied
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date when the payment was applied.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Date Received
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date when the payment was received.
boxi_documents.NAME: Unbilled Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The amount yet not accounted in the current bill cycle (sum of unbilled usage events and one off charges).
boxi_documents.NAME: Total Invoice Payment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The sum of all payments effected since last billrun (can be more than one payment).
boxi_documents.NAME: Adjustment Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- Adjustments (including VAT).
boxi_documents.NAME: Balance Forward
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The balance of the account before invoicing.
boxi_documents.NAME: Statement Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The amount in Euro for an statement account (including VAT).
boxi_documents.NAME: Current Due
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: open amount due ,not payed yet.
boxi_documents.NAME: Invoice Amount
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: ATTENTION: Use this measure only with invoice information and not with payment information. -- The amount in Euro for an invoice (including VAT).
boxi_documents.NAME: Account Payment Indicator
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The indicator if a payment is allocated only to an account but not to an invoice (allocated only to account =1, else 0)
boxi_documents.NAME: Invoiced Account ID
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The invoiced account ID.
boxi_documents.NAME: Bill Run ID
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the bill run.
boxi_documents.NAME: Account Balance
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The actual balance of an account (can be positiv or negativ) and includes the actual invoice.
boxi_documents.NAME: Invoice Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: A unique invoice number that is generated for every invoice in the system.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Stop Reason
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Direct Debit customer can be placed under a 'Payment Stop' whereby no payment requests will be made to the affected customer. This object lists the different payment stop reasons.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Direct Debit customer can be placed under a 'Payment Stop' whereby no payment requests will be made to the affected customer. This object describes the different payment stop types.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Stop Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Direct Debit customer can be placed under a 'Payment Stop' whereby no payment requests will be made to the affected customer. This object lists the different payment stop types.
boxi_documents.NAME: Payment Stop Start Date
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Direct Debit customer can be placed under a 'Payment Stop' whereby no payment requests will be made to the affected customer. This object shows the date when the payment stop starts.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date printed on invoice letter.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The effective date of the bill run.

boxi_documents.NAME: Churn Initiator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!
boxi_documents.NAME: Post To Prepaid Indicator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The indicator (1 - moved, 0 - not moved) if a subscriber was automatically moved from a post-paid account to a pre-paid account after his retirement (with the reason "Ordentliche Vertragsauflosung"). This Indicator is inherited up to the current record.
boxi_documents.NAME: Disconnection Indicator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The indication if the subscriber is disconnected (1) or not (0). The date information is given by the disconnection date valid from and to.

boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Class.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: A more detailed classification of customer type (like business corporate, business company, consumer, ...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Address Primary Indicator
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: A customer can have only one primary address, this address has a primary indicator of 1, all other addresses are marked with a primary indicator of 0.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Address Purpose Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The purpose type of the customer address (like home, legal, campus, business, ...).
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Net Generation Desc
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The description of the indicator if the customer address is in a 2G or 3G area.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Net Generation
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The indicator if the customer address is in a 2G or 3G area.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Address Verified Ind
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the address has been checked (1=checked, 0=not checked).
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Door Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The door number of this customer's address.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Stair Case
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The stair case of this customer's address.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer House Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The house number of this customer's address.

boxi_documents.NAME: Customer City
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The name of the city of this customer's address.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Country
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The name of the country of this customer's address.
boxi_documents.NAME: Customer Email Primary Indicator
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: A customer can have only one primary email, this email has a primary indicator of 1, all other emails are marked with a primary indicator of 0.

boxi_documents.NAME: Audit Duration in Min
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The duration of a case for how long it stays in the same provider group and status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Number of Cases
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The distinct count of cases. If you add provider case, status or audit dates to the result list, the count will be grouped by these objects and therefore one case will be count once for every different characteristic of these objects.
boxi_documents.NAME: Number of Audit Cases
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Number of Audit Cases - not distinct -
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Audit Date/Time From
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The start date and time when a case changes to a new provider group and/or status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Audit Date To
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date until a case was in a provider group with a certain status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Audit Date From
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The start date when a case changes to a new provider group and/or status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Provider Group Change
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The group the case is assigned to, for historical records only provider group changes are considered.
boxi_documents.NAME: Prov. Group Change Date/Time From
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The start date/time when a case changes to a new provider group.
boxi_documents.NAME: Prov. Group Change Date To
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The date until a case was in a provider group.
boxi_documents.NAME: Prov. Group Change Date From
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The start date when a case changes to a new provider group.
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Sequence Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Numbers the historical case records consecutively beginning with 1.
boxi_documents.NAME: Case Complaint Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Complaint cases are marked with "Y", all other cases with "N".

boxi_documents.NAME: Churn Initiator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!

Should be (cmDMS@drei.com), but there are also some internal items with ('FAX=number.withheld@drei.at', 'Manfred.Oberlerchner@drei.com', 'postmaster@drei.com', 'Schlichtungsstelle@rtr.at', 'shop@gcb.at', 'Unbek.Anrufer@drei.at', '3vertrieb@drei.com') or reply_to_address like 'MAILER%' or reply_to_address like 'noreply%')

Email Structured Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: This is used to find whether the Email is structured (set to 'Y') or Unstructured (set to 'N').
boxi_documents.NAME: Multiple Customer Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: (Y, N) This is to identify whether the Email address in the incoming Email is associated with multiple Customers or to find out whether the customer assignment has been changed any more.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Status (System)
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: This is set of Email Status maintained by system and is not editable by agents. (New,Processing,Reassigned,Assigned,Completed,Cancelled) Currently we are not using this field for referring Email status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Status (Agent)
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: (DUP, CAN, REP, OPN) This is the set of Email Statuses that can be updated by agents. This Includes Open Closed - Response Closed - Canceled Closed - Duplicate Closed - Auto Response Currently we are not using this field for updating Email status by agents. Instead of this we are using STATUS - Code and the same is used for referring Email status also.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Process State
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
(ROUT, QUED) Process states are statuses of the application engine mail processor in regards to the email. The Mail Reader process refers to the process state of emails when resending them through the system.This includes
Email Instance Created Queue for Routing Auto Responded by System Email Routed Mailbox Forwarding

Email Structured Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: This is used to find whether the Email is structured (set to 'Y') or Unstructured (set to 'N').

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: This is to identify whether the Email address in the incoming Email is associated with multiple Customers or to find out whether the customer assignment has been changed any more.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Status (System)
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: This is set of Email Status maintained by system and is not editable by agents. (New,Processing,Reassigned,Assigned,Completed,Cancelled) Currently we are not using this field for referring Email status.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Status (Agent)
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: (DUP, CAN, REP, OPN) This is the set of Email Statuses that can be updated by agents. This Includes Open Closed - Response Closed - Canceled Closed - Duplicate Closed - Auto Response Currently we are not using this field for updating Email status by agents. Instead of this we are using STATUS - Code and the same is used for referring Email status also.
boxi_documents.NAME: Email Process State
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
(ROUT, QUED) Process states are statuses of the application engine mail processor in regards to the email. The Mail Reader process refers to the process state of emails when resending them through the system.This includes
Email Instance Created Queue for Routing Auto Responded by System Email Routed Mailbox Forwarding

boxi_documents.NAME: Churn Initiator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!

boxi_documents.NAME: Churn Initiator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!

boxi_documents.NAME: Post To Prepaid Indicator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: The indicator (1 - moved, 0 - not moved) if a subscriber was automatically moved from a post-paid account to a pre-paid account after his retirement (with the reason "Ordentliche Vertragsauflosung"). This Indicator is inherited up to the current record.

boxi_documents.NAME: Disconnection Indicator.

Count OOC distinct
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Number of distinct items. The value is count via the distinct One Off Credit Id
boxi_documents.NAME: Charge Net
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: sum of charges (net). This value is directly exported from PSFT and is not manipulated with
boxi_documents.NAME: Charge Gross
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: sum of charges (gross). This value is directly exported from PSFT and is not manipulated with
boxi_documents.NAME: Count Account Sid distinct
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Number of distinct Accounts Ids. This counts the account sid which are in time unique. But it can be that one account occours more than one, if an report over serveral years is build.
boxi_documents.NAME: One Off Credit Id
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Unique id of an "One Off Credit" item (OOC). This Id should be unique for every raised credit request. The Id is of hexadecimal format and will not render as integer. As the direct us of this Id within the list of values (lov) of BO is not recommended there is no LOV for this object.
boxi_documents.NAME: Authorized Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Flag for Y or N, identifiying authorized items. This flag is set within the PSFT interface by a user. If this flag is not set to Y or the authorized user does not set it to Y it will stay on N. The default value for this object is N.
boxi_documents.NAME: Credit Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Category of credit (Bonus, Korrektur and Kulanz). This object provides feedback how the credit is categorized.
boxi_documents.NAME: Credit Type Description
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Descripton for credit type, which gives more feedback about the categorization. In german
boxi_documents.NAME: Credit Reason
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Reason for credit. Identifies the reason why the credit was given. This object is standardized and only hold prefined values, the user of the PSFT interface can choose.
boxi_documents.NAME: Account Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Reference to PSFT Account Number
boxi_documents.NAME: Msisdn
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: MSISDN of Subscriber
boxi_documents.NAME: Reference Number
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Reference Number to external system
boxi_documents.NAME: Reference Type
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Indicator for the external system holding the reference (case, UMOB, MGM and Webshop)
boxi_documents.NAME: Reject Flag
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Flag Y or N indicating a rejection
boxi_documents.NAME: Reject Reason
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Reason for rejection. This is a free textfield which can be used by the PSFT user to do some comments
boxi_documents.NAME: User Id Creator
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: Ticket creator/requesting user id, which is build up the last name and 2 characters of the first name in small letters.
boxi_documents.NAME: User Id Authorizer
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION: User id for the authorizer of this credit item, the id is composed via the last name and 2 characters of the first name in small letters.

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!

boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!

boxi_documents.NAME: Churn Initiator.
boxi_documents.DESCRIPTION:
Shows either the Termination or the Retirement Reason Initiator. The rule: If Retirement Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Termination Reason Initiator. If Termination Reason Initiator. is NULL Then Retirement Reason Initiator.
Hint: the initiator is NOT restricted to POSTPAID - you have to do it in your report!
